In Greek mythology, Scylla and Charybdis guarded the Strait of Messina, giving rise to the phrase “ caught between a rock and a hard place .” On this Undiscovered Tour of Southern Italy and Sicily, however, you’ll find yourself happily caught between Byzantine and Roman heritage, Norman and Italian traditions, and a vibrant blend of cultures. Beginning in Rome, journey along the Sorrento Coast, down Italy’s heel and toe, and across to Sicily—where ruins, resorts, and rich history await.
